item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 10:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (302 points | 182 comments)
2. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (61 points | 47 comments)
3. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (16 points | 1 comment)
4. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (60 points | 29 comments)
5. Another undersea cable damaged in Baltic Sea (73 points | 43 comments)
6. The leading AI models are now good historians (14 points | 3 comments)
7. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (47 points | 13 comments)
8. The protester's guide to smartphone security (196 points | 94 comments)
9. Steam Brick: No screen, no controller, just a power button and a USB port (783 points | 229 comments)
10. DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via RL (1114 points | 933 comments)
11. Reviving a Dead Audio Format: The Return of ZZM (56 points | 5 comments)
12. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (216 points | 196 comments)
13. 100 years of Bell Labs [pdf] (42 points | 3 comments)
14. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (25 points | 4 comments)
15. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (50 points | 78 comments)
16. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (51 points | 6 comments)
17. Two Bites of Data Science in K (7 points | discuss)
18. Quiet Quitting: Why Employees Are Demanding Fairness and Boundaries (8 points | discuss)
19. Render raises $80M in Series C financing (66 points | 68 comments)
20. The Only Photo of the Concorde Flying at Supersonic Speed (6 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: Orange intelligence, an open source alternative to Apple Intelligence (24 points | 4 comments)
22. OpenRA – Classic strategy games rebuilt for the modern era (567 points | 108 comments)
23. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (29 points | 13 comments)
24. Former tech CEO suing to get the record of his arrest removed from the internet (152 points | 107 comments)
25. I don't like Docker or Podman (73 points | 51 comments)
26. AI slop, suspicion, and writing back (180 points | 137 comments)
27. Show HN: SimpleSearch – Just a list of search bars (16 points | 19 comments)
28. Every HTML Element (439 points | 125 comments)
29. Explainer: What's r1 and everything else? (202 points | 91 comments)
30. The South Vietnamese pilot who landed a Cessna on a carrier to save his family (2019) (323 points | 160 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 26, 2025 at 10:10 PM UTC
